self_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon believes it will be a close match but gives himself a slight edge (53-56% chance of victory). He cites his hand size, arm length, and experience as advantages, while acknowledging Petrenko's explosiveness, strength, and youth.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Devon plans to secure hand position and potentially give away the center, aiming to stop Petrenko and wear him down over the rounds.

Oleg Petrenko.strength: Extremely strong, especially at the center.
Oleg Petrenko.health: Assumed to be in good health.
Oleg Petrenko.previous_match_summary: Dominant in recent matches, current world title holder.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon favors Irina due to her long-standing dominance and experience, despite Brigitta being more active recently.

Irina Gladkaya.health: Looks ready based on recent photos.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon acknowledges Nugzari's unique style but believes Oguzhan's size and past wins make him the favorite, despite recent inactivity.

Nugzari Chikadze.previous_match_summary: Youth champion, known for his head movement technique.

Oguzhan Koçak.strength: Big and strong, with significant past wins.
Oguzhan Koçak.previous_match_summary: Has beaten top competitors like Barbosa and Tautiev.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon is impressed by Danil's strength and focus, predicting a win despite Azat being the current 70kg world champion.
Devon sees Ömer as a future dominant champion due to his physical attributes and technique, despite Artur's strength and experience.

Artur Makarov.strength: Very strong, claims to be 25% stronger than before.
Artur Makarov.previous_match_summary: Beat Mindaugas, known for unique genetics.

Ömer Kozakoğlu.previous_match_summary: Rising star with potential to dominate.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon favors Carolina based on her recent progress and results, though he acknowledges Dimitrina's capabilities.

Dimitrina Petrova.strength: Strong but less followed by Devon.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon believes Betkili's health, strength, and progress since their last match make him the favorite, though Oleg's legendary status is acknowledged.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Betkili may top roll Oleg by later rounds.

Betkili Oniani.previous_match_summary: Progressed significantly since last match with Oleg.

Oleg Zhokh.strength: Legendary hand strength, but possibly not at pre-accident level.
Oleg Zhokh.previous_match_summary: Legend of the sport, but may not be at his best.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon finds this match very hard to call, noting Todd's current form but also Yoshi's potential and past excellence. He sees it as a potential war.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Yoshi's kings move could be key against Todd's lack of press.

Yoshinobu Kanai.strength: Historically very strong, especially in kings move.
Yoshinobu Kanai.previous_match_summary: Former top competitor, returning after a break.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon gives Rino a slight edge due to his technical skills and arm wrestling IQ, despite Ibragim's physical strength.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Rino's versatility and endurance may prevail over Ibragim's raw strength.

Rino Mašić.strength: Technically skilled, high arm wrestling IQ.

Ibragim Sagov.previous_match_summary: Dominant in recent matches, strong fingers.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon leans towards Vitalii due to his experience and past performances, though he acknowledges Georgii's shocking strength and potential.

Vitalii Laletin.previous_match_summary: Close match with Rivas, historically strong.

Georgii Dzeranov.strength: Extremely strong, shocked many with recent performance.
Georgii Dzeranov.previous_match_summary: Dominant win over Rivas, rising hype.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin expresses concern about Michael Todd's heavy PRs close to the match, noting his astronomical strength but potential risk of injury or overtraining.

Michael Todd.health: At risk due to heavy training close to match.
Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: One of the sport's greatest champions.

Genadi Kvikvinia.strength: Strong, but facing a peak Michael Todd.
